    • constructAdaptiveRayBeamThroughPixel

      public java.util.List<Ray> constructAdaptiveRayBeamThroughPixel​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i, double screenDistance, double screenWidth, double screenHeight, double reduce, Point3D center)
      calculates the center ray and 4 corner rays of the aperture and the sub pixel
      Parameters:
      nX - amount of pixels on X
      nY - amount of pixels on y
      j - index j
      i - index i
      screenDistance - screen distance from camera
      screenWidth - screen width
      screenHeight - screen height
      reduce - reduce the pixel into a sub pixel
      center - center of sub pixel
      Returns:
      List of Rays
